lyrics:
"Gucci Speaks" lyrics DJ Holiday & Gucci Mane Lyrics "Gucci Speaks" DJ Holiday, what's happening, what's good? All my DJ niggas, I'm fuckin witcha. On my planet, So Icy shit, nigga. Talmbout DJ niggas out there getting money, man. I'm fuckin witcha the long way. What's up to all my thugs out there, man, in the trap, man? Southside, what's up, man? Eastside, what it do, man? Westside, Northside, man. It's big Gucci, nigga. You know how we rockin, nigga. So Icy Boys in the building. 1017 Brick Squad, nigga. It's a movement, nigga. You know what? We smashing any nigga.
